name: davidberner
description: This is a really simple site for my homepage which can be viewed at [http://www.davidberner.co.uk](http://www.davidberner.co.uk).
author: @davislurve

scripts.build: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.deploy: git checkout gh-pages && git reset --hard origin/master && npm run clean-source && git add -A . && git commit -a -m 'gh-pages update' && git push origin gh-pages --force && git checkout master
